title: description
Prices of 50,000 round cut diamonds: A dataset containing the prices and other attributes of almost 54,000 diamonds

title: cut
column3: quality of the cut (Fair, Good, Very Good, Premium, Ideal)

title: color
column3: diamond color, from D (best) to J (worst)

title: clarity
column3: a measurement of how clear the diamond is (I1 (worst), SI2, SI1, VS2, VS1, VVS2, VVS1, IF (best))

title: depth
column3: total depth percentage = z / mean(x, y) = 2 * z / (x + y) (43-79)

title: table
column3: width of top of diamond relative to widest point (43-95)
